properties.description: Passing the Script directly from the AO Workflow
Passing the Script directly from the AO Workflow
Passing the Script directly from the AO Workflow
properties.windows_script:
Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
Set exec = objShell.Exec("ipconfig /all")
Call WScript.StdOut.Write(exec.StdOut.ReadAll)

properties.description: Passing the Script directly from the AO Workflow  with argumanets
properties.windows_script:
On Error Resume Next
Dim fso, folder, files, NewsFile,sFolder

Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
sFolder = Wscript.Arguments.Item(0)
If sFolder = "" Then
Wscript.Echo "No Folder parameter was passed"
Wscript.Quit
End If
Set NewFile = fso.CreateTextFile(sFolder&"\FileList.txt", True)
Set folder = fso.GetFolder(sFolder)
Set files = folder.Files

For each folderIdx In files
NewFile.WriteLine(folderIdx.Name)
Next
NewFile.Close
